patthana17.25:4.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.25:5.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.25:5.3: Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa … pe … avigate pannarasa.
patthana17.25:6.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.25:6.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
